channel.title: News and Updates on Richelle Jade Tuquero
channel.description: Recent content in News and Updates on Richelle Jade Tuquero

item.title: Limit torus in a quantum gas setup
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Using bifurcation theory, we demonstrate that a limit cycle instability in a quantum system can lead to the emergence of a limit torus.

item.title: International School on Open Quantum Many-Body Systems
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Participated in the international school in Tutzing, Germany.

item.title: Kick-off-Workshop FOR 5688 in Berlin
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: We participated in the kick-off meeting for the DFG-Research Unit FOR 5688. This includes meetings, discussions, and poster presentations.

item.title: Smooth transition to dynamical phases due to quantum noise
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: We showed how quantum noise affects the general transition or cross-over from stationary to dyanmical phase such as LCs.

item.title: Moving to Germany for my PhD!
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Officially joined the QUEST group under Prof. Dr. Zilberberg!

item.title: MS thesis defended!
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Successfully defended my Master of Science Thesis last 06 June 2024 entitled Phase-space methods and dynamical phases in an atom-cavity model.

item.title: Liknayan Podcast Guesting
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Joined in as a guest to an episode of Liknayan Podcast explaining about what a time crystal is and my current journey in physics.

item.title: 41st SPP Conference
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Presented an oral presentation to my full conference paper about the effectiveness of positive-P representation in simulating a Dicke model in Siargao, Philippines for the 2023 SPP Conference.

item.title: 40th SPP Conference
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Presented in an oral presentation in the 39th Samahang Pisika ng Pilipinas Physics Conference. In here, we highlight the influence of dissipation and lattice depth to the lifetime of continuous time crystals in an atom-cavity system.

item.title: BS thesis defense!
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Successfully defended my Bachelor of Science Thesis last 01 June 2022 entitled Influence of harmonic confinement and contact interaction in an atom-cavity system.

item.title: Stable and Metastable Dissipative Time Crystal
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: We showed that stable dissipative time crystals can exist beyond the ideal limit and introduced a new phase, the prethermal dissipative time crystal in an atom-cavity system.

item.title: 39th SPP Conference
item.author: richellejade.l.tuquero@gmail.com (Richelle Jade L. Tuquero)
item.description: Presented in an oral presentation in the 39th Samahang Pisika ng Pilipinas Physics Conference. In here, we highlight the imbalance of Density Wave states in the presence of a trapping potential.
